definition: weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than
a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
strong or weak/intensity/amount of force or pressure
small and weak/puny/the small and weak/children/women and children

sentences.english: Connection among quasi-H closedness, weakly continuous mapping and compactness is also shown.
sentences.chinese: 并指出了拟H闭性与弱连续映射和紧性的联系。

sentences.english: So purification of less volatile components.
Still, these types of viruses can cause trouble for people with weakened immune systems.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这类病毒能给免疫系统弱的人们带来麻烦。

sentences.english: The 67-year-old kidney transplant recipient has a weakened immune system.
sentences.chinese: 这位接受过肾脏移植手术的老人免疫系统非常弱。

sentences.english: Passwords that are too weak of course invite brute-force attacks.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，弱密码的确容易招致暴力破解攻击。

sentences.english: If the references weren't weak, the application would have a memory leak.
sentences.chinese: 如果引用不弱，那么应用程序会有内存泄漏。

sentences.english: Web readers are persistently weak at judging whether information is trustworthy.
sentences.chinese: 网络读者判断信息是否真实可信的能力越来越弱。

sentences.english: Such process can also release anions , which can adjust the pH of water to slight basic.
sentences.chinese: 释放一定的负离子，调整水的酸碱度使水呈弱碱性。

sentences.english: Conclusion The cardiac functional effect of doxofylline are weaker than that of aminophylline.
sentences.chinese: 结论多索茶碱对患者心功能的影响较氨茶碱弱。

sentences.english: One of the obvious characteristics of public communication is strong unidirectivity and weak feedback mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 大众传播的显著特点之一是单向性强，反馈机制弱。

sentences.english: The pupil becomes smaller in bright light and larger in dim light.
sentences.chinese: 光线强时瞳孔变小，弱时变大。

sentences.english: Thus, many consider them as weakly-typed data structures.
sentences.chinese: 因此，许多人把它们看作弱类型的数据结构。

sentences.english: I don't like his cruel treatment of those poor horses.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢他那么残忍的对待那些廋弱的马。

sentences.english: The effect of clamping distribution is an important factor in low-rigidity structure part deformation.
sentences.chinese: 装夹布局是弱刚度结构件加工变形的重要影响因素。

sentences.english: It seemed so delicate, so weak is the spring night it destroy unearthed.
sentences.chinese: 它显得那么嫩，那么弱，是一夜春风把它摧出土的。

sentences.english: Excessively long back, especially when coupled with weak loin connection.
sentences.chinese: 过长的背部，腰部尤其是弱连接耦合。

definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
small and weak/puny/the small and weak/children/women and children
strong or weak/intensity/amount of force or pressure
eager to excel/eager to get ahead in life/strong-minded
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
